channel.title: Posts on R-Ladies Chicago
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on R-Ladies Chicago

item.title: Trying out R Tours
item.description: At R-Ladies, we want everyone to feel welcome, especially women and minority genders. Our favorite part of R-Ladies is cultivating an inclusive learning community–it is a challenge, but well worth it. As an R Community, where we are passionate about what we do in R, accessibility and inclusivity also means cultivating a welcoming environment for R users of all levels–from beginner to expert to everyone in between. The Chicago organizing team works hard to plan our events intentionally where there is a combination of tutorials, talks about specific topics, and social events that showcase the strengths and address the interests of the local R-Ladies community.

item.title: Call for Blog Posts
item.description: R-Ladies Chicago is excited to start this blog to showcase the perspectives of different members in the R-Ladies Chicago community! We are looking for individuals who are interested in contributing to this blog. Whether you just want to write a single blog post or contribute regularly, we want to hear from you! We’re hoping to have two new posts each month on this blog. Blog posts could consist of: Event Recaps (either an R-Ladies Meetup or Study Group Meeting or another R-related event)
